definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Jos 22:8 only pl. [[נְכָסִים]] riches, treasures (prob. As. or Aram. loan-word, cf. As. nikâsu, property, wealth, gain, Dl:HWB 463, Syr. nekose0 wealth; on deriv. fr. As. nikâsu, cut off, hew down, behead, etc., Syr. nkas slay, Targum [[נְכַס]], NH [[נׇכַס]] id., through meaning cattle for slaughter, cf. Frä:98 Hpt:Hbr.iii (Jan.1887), 107 ff. Schwally:Idiot. 120 f. Brock:ad voc.);—Jos 22:8 (P), 2Ch 1:11, 2Ch 1:12, Ec 6:2 (all ‖[[עשֶׁר]], [[כָּבוֹד]]), Ec 5:18 (‖[[עשֶׁר]]).
